message:
A mother claims boys in her son's kindergarten class beat him up, and that the teacher told them to do it....

‎"'[The teacher] approached me & said that my son had hit another kid & to punish him she had all the boys in the class beat him up,' said Dunmire."

http://www.krqe.com/dpp/news/education/report-teacher-made-kids-beat-student
